scripts.version:apply: node scripts/set-version.mjs apply && node scripts/set-readme-version.mjs apply
scripts.version:restore: node scripts/set-readme-version.mjs restore && node scripts/set-version.mjs restore
scripts.build:versioned: npm run version:apply && npm run build && npm run version:restore
scripts.publish:ci: npm run version:apply && npm run build && npm publish --provenance --access public --ignore-scripts && npm run version:restore
